label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_013
content:
## 2024-09-14 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 12685921
- Unique source IPs: 1395
- Unique destination IPs: 5749
- Average flow duration (sec): 25.0
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 79.3
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 13.7
- ICMP percentage: 0.5
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 122
- East-West traffic percentage: 67.9

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 2877863
- Unique domains: 43244
- NXDomain responses: 10209
- DGA suspected domains: 1
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 4516
- Average response time (ms): 2.2
- Cache hit percentage: 92.5
- TXT record queries: 763
- PTR queries: 8306

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 556
- Blocked by IPS: 62
- Signature matches: 373
- Anomaly detections: 22
- Severity critical alerts: 1
- Severity high alerts: 10
- Severity medium alerts: 38
- Severity low alerts: 231
- Top signatures: 
  - ET POLICY SMB2 NT Create File
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
  - ET SCAN Nmap SYN Scan
- False positive rate percentage: 13.7

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 3.46
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 1.94
- WAN peak (Gbps): 9.1
- LAN core utilization percentage: 58.1
- DMZ utilization percentage: 25.6
- VPN concentrator sessions: 259
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 2.44
- Top talker IP: 10.15.247.15
- Top talker bytes (GB): 26.9

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 1
- Prefix withdrawals: 2
- AS path changes: 3
- Route flaps: 2
- Peer sessions established: 6
- Peer sessions down: 0
- Max prefix warnings: 0
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 5
- New entries for organization domains: 4
- Suspicious issuances: 1
- Expired certificates in use: 2
- TLS 1.0 connections: 12
- TLS 1.1 connections: 7
- TLS 1.2 connections: 71834
- TLS 1.3 connections: 134014
- Weak cipher usage: 5

### Infrastructure
#### netflow-collector-01
- CPU percentage: 40
- Memory percentage: 55
- Disk percentage: 77
#### dns-resolver-01
- CPU percentage: 26
- Memory percentage: 48
- Cache size (GB): 3.7
#### ids-sensor-01
- CPU percentage: 35
- Memory percentage: 58
- Packets per second: 127802
#### ids-sensor-02
- CPU percentage: 48
- Memory percentage: 64
- Packets per second: 81405
#### border-router-01
- CPU percentage: 31
- Memory percentage: 39
- Interface errors: 0

### Events
- DNS: TXT record burst from dev-cluster-03 — false positive
- IPS blocked 6 packets from 198.51.98.138: brute force
- TLS audit: deprecated cipher on legacy-app-01 — remediation ticket opened

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-14. 12685921 flows analyzed. 2877863 DNS queries. 556 IDS alerts (1 critical, 10 high). WAN avg 3.46/1.94 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
